mapper.select: SELECT (select count(r_no) from rental)|| '!!' || a || '!!' || b || '!!' || c || '!!' || d || '!!' || e || '!!' || f || '!!' || g || '!!' || h || '!!' || i || '!!' || j || '!!' || k || '!!' || l status FROM dual, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/1'),0) a from dual) a, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/2'),0) b from dual) b, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/3'),0) c from dual) c, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/4'),0) d from dual) d, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/5'),0) e from dual) e, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/6'),0) f from dual) f, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/7'),0) g from dual) g, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/8'),0) h from dual) h, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/9'),0) i from dual) i, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/10'),0) j from dual) j, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/11'),0) k from dual) k, (select nvl((select count(r_no) from rental where to_char(r_regdate, 'yyyy/fmMM') = '2019/12'),0) l from dual) l
